Hello Hagop ,

As we discussed last week as well that we will not be able to take the car after 2nd August . As one month extension period also getting over.

We only have 1 Car for Tryano ( Nissan x trail ) Details are shared already. 
Last week you confirmed that we will get the insurance confirmation, but we still are waiting for the same.
We have completed all the checks done as per your request and also just to let you know that car was already passed through RTA passing and we just need insurance to renew the mulkiya / registration.

Please update as this is pending from long time now !!
